Leave the musty history books behind as this thrilling, action-packed series plunges you in the heart of the bloody combat and intrigue that defined the arc of the greatest Western civilization.

Experience Ancient Rome firsthand on the street, the battlefield and the senate floor.

Filled with dramatic re-enactments and action-packed battle scenes, ROME: RISE AND FALL OF AN EMPIRE chronicles the story of one of history's greatest empires from its first major battle (the Barbarian Invasion of 114 BC), through its remarkable military feats, to its eventual fall. Told from the point of view of the Roman people under violent attack, this exceptional documentary achievement takes viewers inside the fiery battles of a civilization crumbling in the face of brutal invasions.

Vivid recreations offer a firsthand look at the chaotic state of an empire in flames, while compelling characters on both sides fight for victory. Teeming streets, horseback battles, warring armies, and gladiatorial contests coexist with magnificent tales of Roman debauchery and excess. Lavish production values ensure that every frame of this fan-favorite series delights and amazes.

From the first Roman-Barbarian War to the very last gruesome battle, HISTORYÃ‚Â® follows each harrowing moment of the famed empire's slow decline and the human struggle for survival in this exciting 13 episode series, available now in this single awe-striking DVD set.
